statements: SELECT * FROM maintenance_tasks;
SELECT task_id, task_description, estimated_duration FROM maintenance_tasks WHERE drone_id = 1;
SELECT task_description, start_date, completion_date FROM maintenance_tasks WHERE estimated_duration > 3;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_tasks ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT task_id, task_description FROM maintenance_tasks WHERE completion_date IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_tasks WHERE drone_id = 101 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT task_id, task_description, estimated_duration FROM maintenance_tasks WHERE estimated_duration > 3 ORDER BY task_id ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT drone_id, COUNT(*) AS total_tasks FROM maintenance_tasks GROUP BY drone_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY total_tasks DESC;
SELECT task_id, start_date, completion_date, DATEDIFF(completion_date, start_date) AS duration FROM maintenance_tasks WHERE DATEDIFF(completion_date, start_date) > 5 ORDER BY duration DESC;
SELECT task_id, drone_id, task_description FROM maintenance_tasks WHERE task_description LIKE '%inspection%' ORDER BY task_id ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_records;
SELECT drone_id, maintenance_task FROM maintenance_records WHERE record_id = 1;
SELECT scheduled_task, scheduled_date FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE drone_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule ORDER BY scheduled_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_records WHERE drone_id = 1;
SELECT record_id, drone_id, maintenance_task FROM maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT record_id, maintenance_task, maintenance_date FROM maintenance_records WHERE drone_id = 2 ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_records WHERE drone_id = 3 AND maintenance_task LIKE '%inspection%';
SELECT record_id, drone_id, maintenance_date FROM maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM Drone;
SELECT drone_id, drone_name, purchase_date FROM Drone WHERE drone_id = 1;
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM MaintenanceTask WHERE estimated_duration > 5;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceRecord WHERE completion_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT record_id, drone_id, task_id FROM MaintenanceRecord WHERE drone_id = 3 AND task_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceTask WHERE estimated_duration > 60;
SELECT drone_name, purchase_date FROM Drone ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM MaintenanceTask WHERE task_id IN (1, 2, 3);

SELECT m.record_id, d.drone_name, t.task_name, m.maintenance_date FROM MaintenanceRecord m JOIN Drone d ON m.drone_id = d.drone_id JOIN MaintenanceTask t ON m.task_id = t.task_id WHERE m.completion_status = 'Completed';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records, MAX(maintenance_date) AS last_maintenance FROM MaintenanceRecord;
SELECT * FROM Drones ORDER BY drone_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT drone_name, manufacturer, production_date FROM Drones WHERE manufacturer = 'DJI';
SELECT drone_name, model, production_date FROM Drones WHERE production_date > '2020-01-01' ORDER BY production_date ASC;
SELECT id, maintenance_type, maintenance_description FROM MaintenanceRecords WHERE maintenance_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Tasks WHERE completion_status = FALSE ORDER BY due_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Drones WHERE manufacturer = 'DJI';
SELECT drone_name, model FROM Drones WHERE production_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT task_name, due_date FROM Tasks WHERE completion_status = TRUE ORDER BY due_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceRecords JOIN Drones ON MaintenanceRecords.drone_id = Drones.id WHERE maintenance_type = 'Repair';
SELECT employee_name, department FROM Employees WHERE hire_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY department, hire_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM drones;
SELECT drone_id, drone_model, status FROM drones ORDER BY status ASC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT drone_id, maintenance_description FROM maintenance_records WHERE drone_id = 'c8d87daa-274f-4b06-9081-c84c4385b64c';
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM maintenance_tasks WHERE task_name LIKE '%inspection%';
SELECT * FROM drones LIMIT 5;
SELECT drone_id, drone_model, last_maintenance_date FROM drones WHERE status = 'maintenance';

SELECT drones.drone_id, drones.drone_model, maintenance_records.maintenance_date, maintenance_records.maintenance_description FROM drones INNER JOIN maintenance_records ON drones.drone_id = maintenance_records.drone_id ORDER BY maintenance_records.maintenance_date DESC;

SELECT drones.drone_model, maintenance_tasks.task_name, maintenance_tasks.task_description FROM drones INNER JOIN assigned_tasks ON drones.drone_id = assigned_tasks.drone_id INNER JOIN maintenance_tasks ON assigned_tasks.task_id = maintenance_tasks.task_id WHERE assigned_tasks.status = 'completed';

SELECT technicians.technician_name, technicians.technician_specialization, assigned_tasks.assigned_date, assigned_tasks.completion_date FROM technicians INNER JOIN assigned_tasks ON technicians.technician_id = assigned_tasks.technician_id WHERE assigned_tasks.status = 'pending';
